Doug, this looks like it might be related to some recent coolbar work.  If not 
please redirect.

If you've been following the integration builds closely, could you try reset 
the perspective and trying this again?  Thanks....

If you can duplicate, then please re-open.  Otherwise, I'm closing this as a 
duplicate of Bug 52549.
